snippet: Six new Ford models, including the 2014 Ford Fiesta, as well as some hybrid and plug-in hybrid versions, are involved.
abstract: Ford Motor Company lowers fuel-economy ratings for some of its vehicles for second time in less than a year; will reduce mileage rating on six new models, most of them hybrids, and pay $125 to $1,050 to customers who own or lease about 200,000 of the cars in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Six new Ford models, including the 2014 Ford Fiesta, as well as some hybrid and plug-in hybrid versions, are involved.

headline.main: Ford Lowers Gas Mileage on 6 Models, All 2013-14s
headline.print_headline: Ford Lowers Gas Mileage on 6 Models, All 2013-14s
